result.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ عَهِدۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَنَسِيَ وَلَمۡ نَجِدۡ لَهُۥ عَزۡمٗا
result.translation: Ni ukuri Twebwe Allah, Twarahanuye Adamu imbere yuko afungura ku camwa, ko atohirahira ngo agifungureko, maze aribagira igihe yoshwa na Ibilisi, nta n’ishaka Twasanze afise ryo kwubahiriza ibwirizwa Twamuhaye.
